filesystem_audit.check: Ensure cramfs kernel module is not loaded
Ensure freevxfs kernel module is not loaded
Ensure hfs kernel module is not loaded
Ensure hfsplus kernel module is not loaded
Ensure jffs2 kernel module is not loaded
Ensure overlayfs kernel module is not loaded
Ensure squashfs kernel module is not loaded
Ensure udf kernel module is not loaded
Ensure usb-storage kernel module is not loaded
Ensure sticky bit is set on all world-writable directories
